title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Hybrid/Dual Design Studio-Based Advanced Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective team project procedures in a blended (remote-face-to-face) environment by utilizing at least three hybrid learning tools (e.g., LMS forums, mobile collaboration apps)
Learners can propose solutions tailored to two or more real-world professional scenarios (medical/legal/technical) by applying the Design Studio methodology for scientific problem-solving
Learners submit project outcomes integrating digital/analog resources and can perform three or more improvement cycles based on peer assessment and instructor feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
